note.p: Officer in the Indian Army. First commission, 1860. Staff corps, 1872. Police captain in Cuddapah (Kadapa), Madras Presidency, 1875. Rose to the rank of lieutenant-colonel before retirement.
Census returns of England and Wales 1911 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG14/12783/160)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2013)
